title: `minProperties` covered by `required`
description: If the number of items in `required` ≥ `minProperties`, the `minProperties` keyword is redundant.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: minProperties redundant with required
comprehensiveExamples.description: If required has N items and minProperties ≤ N, minProperties adds nothing.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: minProperties higher than required
comprehensiveExamples.description: Using a larger minProperties than required can add a constraint.

message: Remove `minProperties` – the `required` list already guarantees that many properties.
